channel.title: Axoloti Core availability?
channel.description: Sorry if this is in the wrong section or if its been recently covered elsewhere. Pls remove if so(or i can? Not sure its my first post). Is there any kind of email list i can get on to be notified when its back in stock or should i just keep my eyes peeled? I know due to suppliers, a small dedicated crew, etc its hard to say exactly when but im dying to start experimenting! Thanks!
